ComicInfo.Title: The Hammer and the Holocaust!; The Meaning of... "Ragnarok!"
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Hammer and the Holocaust!: The weakened and defeated Thor returns to Asgard where he finds Seidring has taken over. He battles the 'Odin power' and defeats Seidring only to collapse himself.
The Meaning of... "Ragnarok!": Volla reveals the events of the day of Ragnarok.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:17:30. [Issue ID 19990]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
